violations.pattern: Custom CSS classes → design system classes

violations.match:
style={{
        backgroundColor: '#3b82f6',
        color: 'white',
        border: 'none',
        borderRadius: '6px',
        padding: '0.5rem 1rem',
        fontSize: '0.875rem',
        fontWeight: 'bold',
        cursor: 'pointer',
        transition: 'all 0.2s',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        gap: '0.5rem'
      }}

violations.replacement:
import { useLayeraTranslation } from '@layera/tolgee';
// ✅ Use LEGO hooks and utilities
